name: Popmundo - Colored Skills
description:
Popmundo - Colored Skills
The linknames of the skills look now like the Popomungo extension (rainbow) numbers. It's so colored!

Works with:
http://userstyles.org/styles/9081 Popmundo - Skill Numbers

Use it with or without the Popomungo extension => http://popomungo.mozdev.org/
